文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk1
证据片段: It is proposed that on annealing at 560°C the β-Zr phase (containing Fe and Cr in solution) transforms to α-Zr + β-Nb + Zr(FeCr)2 phases

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk4
证据片段: Eight tubes were heat-treated at $5 6 0 ^ { \circ } C$ for $^ { 2 4 \mathrm { ~ h ~ } }$ to produce significant decomposition of ${ \beta } { \cdot } Z { \mathbf { r } }$ to $\mathsf { \beta - N b }$

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk4
证据片段: The intent of this treatment was to simulate possible in-reactor decomposition of $\beta \mathrm { - } Z \mathbf { r }$ , observed in removed $\mathbf { Z r { - } } 2 . 5 \mathbf { N b }$ pressure tubes.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk4
证据片段: After annealing, the dislocation density is reduced

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk4
证据片段: X-ray diffraction (XRD) spectra for all heat-treated samples showed diffraction peaks at diffraction angles $2 \theta = 3 8 . 6 4 ^ { \circ }$ and $5 5 . 7 4 ^ { \circ }$ .These correspond to the first two reflections (110) and (200) of bcc $\beta { \cdot } \mathbf { N } \mathbf { b }$

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk4
证据片段: Thus it is probable that all of the $\scriptstyle \mathbf { \beta - Z r }$ has transformed to $\mathbf { \alpha - Z r }$ and $\beta$ -Nb after heating for $^ { 2 4 \mathrm { ~ h ~ } }$ at $5 6 0 ^ { \circ } C$

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk5
证据片段: A third type of intermetallic precipitate was found in heat-treated samples of tube D1301. These precipitates were identified as the $\mathrm { Z r } _ { 2 } \mathrm { F e }$ phase.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk5
证据片段: has only been positively identified in tubes with Fe contents greater than about 500 ppm [14]

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk5
证据片段: After annealing at $5 6 0 \mathrm { { } ^ { \circ } C }$ for $^ { 2 4 \mathrm { ~ h ~ } }$

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: Heating of the as-fabricated, coldworked tubing for $2 4 \mathrm { ~ h ~ }$ at $5 6 0 \%$ produced a breakdown of the $\beta$ -Zr ${ \sim } 2 0 ~ \mathrm { w t } \%$ Nbnetwork surrounding the elongated $\alpha$ -Zr grains to discrete particles of $\beta$ -Nb $\sim 8 3 \ \mathrm { w t } \%$ Nb).

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: If during reactor operation at ${ \sim } 3 0 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C }$ there is a breakdown of the ${ \beta } { \cdot } Z \tau$ phase to $\beta$ -Nb and the concurrent precipitation of $Z \mathrm { { r } ( F e C r ) _ { \vec { \tau } } }$ , the corrosion/hydriding resistance could be affected.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: The microstructure of cold-worked $Z \mathrm { r } { - } 2 . 5 \mathrm { N b }$ pressure tubing consists of elongated $\alpha - \mathrm { Z r }$ grains with a $\beta { - } Z \operatorname { r }$ $( \sim 2 0 \ \mathrm { w t } \%$ Nb) network at the $\mathbf { \alpha } \mathbf { - } \mathbf { } \mathbf { } \mathbf { } Z \mathbf { r }$ grain boundaries.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: A very small volume fraction of $\mathsf { Z r } _ { \vec { \mathbf { \imath } } } \mathrm { F e }$ precipitates are also present in tubes containing greater than about 500 ppm Fe.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: The $\beta$ -quenching during processing of the tubes appeared to suppress $\mathrm { Z r } _ { 2 } \mathrm { F e }$ precipitation in the high Fe content tubes.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk6
证据片段: A larger $\alpha { - } Z \tau$ grain size also appeared to promote the formation of $\mathsf { Z r } _ { \mathfrak { L } } \mathsf { F e }$ precipitates.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk8
证据片段: The Fe content of the β-Nb particles did. however, vary from particle to particle.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_014_chunk8
证据片段: Fewer EDX determinations were made for Fe in the β-Zr phase. but indications were that it was higher than for the β-Nb phase.
